data.comment: The match is underway at Mercedes Benz Arena.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 3, Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Stuttgart.
B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski goes close with a header against the bar.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 5, Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Throw-in for B. Munich at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 7, B. Munich's Leon Goretzka attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Harm Osmers awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stuttgart.
In the minute 9, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Harm Osmers signals a B. Munich throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
Harm Osmers awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Stuttgart are in shooting range from this free kick.
Stuttgart are coming forward and Gonzalo Castro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
In the minute 11, Harm Osmers blows against Stuttgart's Tanguy Coulibaly for offside.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Stuttgart.
Stuttgart needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Harm Osmers signals a Stuttgart throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for B. Munich!
In the minute 19, Tanguy Coulibaly for the home team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Stuttgart, B. Munich push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Tanguy Coulibaly puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Silas Wamangituka with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Stuttgart in their own half.
Throw-in B. Munich.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In the minute 24, In Stuttgart B. Munich drive forward through Benjamin Pavard. His shot is on target but it's saved.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Stuttgart.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Stuttgart.
Benjamin Pavard for B. Munich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 28, B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in their own half.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Harm Osmers awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Can Stuttgart capitalize from this throw-in deep inside B. Munich's half?
In the minute 31, B. Munich to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Stuttgart.
Harm Osmers signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Stuttgart's area.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
B. Munich drives forward and Serge Gnabry gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 35, Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Stuttgart Stuttgart attack through Philipp Forster. The finish is off target, however.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Stuttgart's Philipp Forster gets in a shot on goal at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Stuttgart's Silas Wamangituka misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stuttgart.
In the minute 37, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Kingsley Coman.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 40, In Stuttgart a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stuttgart advance rapidly upfield but Harm Osmers blows for offside.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 42, Stuttgart are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to B. Munich.
Serge Gnabry gets his shot on target but fails to score for B. Munich.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Harm Osmers will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Stuttgart.
In the minute 45, Robert Lewandowski is on target to give B. Munich a 1-2 advantage.
Great play from Kingsley Coman to set up the goal.
The second-half is now underway.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In the minute 46, Stuttgart to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Harm Osmers signals a Stuttgart throw-in in B. Munich's half.
In the minute 48, In Stuttgart, Robert Lewandowski (B. Munich) misses the target with a header.
Harm Osmers awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
B. Munich needs to be cautious. Stuttgart have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 50, Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Attention is being given to B. Munichâ€™s Lucas Hernandez and play has been suspended briefly.
B. Munich's Kingsley Coman breaks free at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in Stuttgart.
Lucas Hernandez has recovered and rejoins the match in Stuttgart.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
In the minute 58, Free kick Stuttgart.
The away team has substituted Lucas Hernandez with Niklas Sule. Hans-Dieter Flick is thus making his first change.
Wataru Endo for Stuttgart drives towards goal at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Stuttgart make their first substitution with Mateo Klimowicz replacing Gonzalo Castro.
In the minute 60, Atakan Karazor is on a sub for Konstantinos Mavropanos for Stuttgart.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Stuttgart.
In the minute 66, Stuttgart have a goal kick.
Leroy Sane is replacing Serge Gnabry for B. Munich at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Stuttgart are pushing forward but Silas Wamangituka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for B. Munich at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In Stuttgart Stuttgart's Silas Wamangituka is caught offside.
In the minute 69, Hans-Dieter Flick is making the team's third substitution at Mercedes Benz Arena with Nianzou Tanguy Kouassi replacing Jerome Boateng.
The away team have replaced Kingsley Coman with Douglas Costa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Hans-Dieter Flick.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 70, B. Munich's Leroy Sane breaks free at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 72, In Stuttgart Stuttgart attack through Orel Mangala. The finish is off target, however.
Harm Osmers awards B. Munich a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 73, Harm Osmers awards B. Munich a goal kick.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Borna Sosa of Stuttgart gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, B. Munich have a goal kick.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a third substitution, with Sasa Kalajdzic replacing Philipp Forster.
Throw-in B. Munich.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
B. Munich push upfield but Harm Osmers quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 80, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
Pellegrino Matarazzo is making the team's fourth substitution at Mercedes Benz Arena with Roberto Massimo replacing Tanguy Coulibaly.
Harm Osmers signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 83, Corentin Tolisso is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corentin Tolisso, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Javi Martinez is the substitute for B. Munich.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for B. Munich at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Stuttgart's Mateo Klimowicz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
In the minute 86, Stuttgart's Sasa Kalajdzic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Harm Osmers.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
It's now 1-3 in Stuttgart as Douglas Costa scores for B. Munich.
That's a fine assist from Leroy Sane.
Stuttgart's Wataru Endo breaks free at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stuttgart.
At Mercedes Benz Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Stuttgart drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
